subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Chelsea used Oscar’s first goal of the season to beat Bolton, 2-1, in the League Cup. Manchester City, the defending champion, routed another second-tier team, Sheffield Wednesday, by 7-0, with seven second-half goals.
snippet: Chelsea used Oscar’s first goal of the season to beat Bolton, 2-1, in the League Cup. Manchester City, the defending champion, routed another second-tier team, Sheffield Wednesday, by 7-0, with seven second-half goals.
